meanings.sent1: The wind carried the seeds abiotically across the field.
meanings.sent2: Chemical reactions can occur abiotically in a laboratory setting.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to dance abiotically, but it looked quite mechanical.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed abiotically through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The snow fell abiotically, covering everything in a blanket of white.

meanings.definition: Without the involvement of living organisms
meanings.sent1: The abiotically formed crystals sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The abiotically produced energy source was highly efficient.
meanings.sent3: The abiotically grown plants were surprisingly vibrant.
meanings.sent4: The abiotically constructed building stood strong against the elements.
meanings.sent5: The abiotically created landscape seemed untouched by time.
